title: 1869 Cinncinati Peck & Snyder - Looking to Buy
author: duffydawg

posts.post_title: 1869 Cinncinati Peck & Snyder - Looking to Buy
posts.post_content:
Anyone have a Peck & Snyder that they are selling...please no Ebay phonie balony.... :)

My guess is there are two dozen to three dozen on the trading cards and an equal amount of CDVs out there...probably total 75 or less??

You could always make an offer I couldn't refuse on arguably one of the best in the hobby.....but I don't really want to sell it.....
 
 
 
 
[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/pnucpeckandsnyder.jpg[/IMG]

just saw one in SCP's auction

Lot #1
